critique.topic: Conduct market research to identify the demand for AI interview prep tools in South Asia

assumptions: assuming no demand due to lack of search results

logical_issues: assuming no information is equivalent to no demand

improvements.suggestion: Conduct surveys, interviews, or focus groups to gather primary data on the demand for AI interview prep tools in South Asia
Analyze regional market trends, competition, and consumer behavior to better understand the demand for AI interview prep tools
Consult with experts, industry reports, and academic studies to increase the credibility of the research findings

critique.recommendation: Do not use the current research findings due to incomplete and inaccurate data. Instead, consider conducting further research to gather reliable and credible information on the demand for AI interview prep tools in South Asia.
